insurancemodel

Class LifePolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • insurancemodel.Policy
      • insurancemodel.LifePolicy

  • public class LifePolicy
extends Policy
    This is a class to create and control all life insurance policies. It contains details of the age of policy holder, amount for which the life is covered and the estimated health risk the holder possess, on a scale from 0 (lowest) to 5 (highest).

      • Fields inherited from class insurancemodel.Policy

    • Constructor Detail

      • LifePolicy

        public LifePolicy(int policyYear,
                  java.lang.String policyNo,
                  int newAgeOfHolder,
                  int newInsuredAmount,
                  double newHealthRisk)
           throws IllegalPolicyException
        Constructor for the LifePolicy class. Takes variables that are inherited from the Policy class and that are parsed in from the InputData class.
        Parameters:
        policyYear - inherited int variable from Policy.java that is the year of issue for this policy
        policyNo - inherited String variable from Policy.java that is the unique number of this policy
        newAgeOfHolder - the age of the policy holder for this LifePolicy object
        newInsuredAmount - the amount the life of the holder is insured for, for this LifePolicy object.
        newHealthRisk - the health risk posed to the holder of this LifePolicy object.
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - catches any policyNos or policyYears that are out-width their boundaries and prints an error message.

    • Method Detail

      • getAgeOfHolder

        public int getAgeOfHolder()
        Accessor method for retrieving the age of the policy holder.
        Returns:
        returns an int value with the age of the holder of this LifePolicy object.

      • getInsuredAmount

        public int getInsuredAmount()
        Accessor method for retrieving the amount the life is covered for.
        Returns:
        returns an int value with the amount the life of the holder of this LifePolicy object is insured for

      • getHealthRisk

        public double getHealthRisk()
        Accessor method for retrieving the health risk posed to the policy holder
        Returns:
        returns a double value that is the health risk posed to the holder of this LifePolicyObject. This is on a scale of 0(lowest) to 5(highest)

      • setAgeOfHolder

        public void setAgeOfHolder(int newAgeOfHolder)
        Mutator method for changing the age of the policy holder.
        Parameters:
        newAgeOfHolder - the new age of this LifePolicy holder

      • setInsuredAmount

        public void setInsuredAmount(int newInsuredAmount)
        Mutator method for changing the amount the life is insured for.
        Parameters:
        newInsuredAmount - the new amount the life of this LifePolicy's holder is insured for.

      • setHealthRisk

        public void setHealthRisk(double newHealthRisk)
        Mutator method for changing the health risk posed to the policy holder.
        Parameters:
        newHealthRisk - the new double value for this LifePolicy's holder health risk

        public double getPremium()
        Abstract method that is inherited from Policy to calculate the premiums for Life Insurance policies.
        Returns:
        the calculated premium for a this LifePolicy object.
